description: Threat actors increasingly use Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) attachments to display phishing forms or deploy malware while evading detection. [...]
title: Phishing emails increasingly use SVG attachments to evade detection

description: A critical authentication bypass vulnerability has been discovered impacting the WordPress plugin 'Really Simple Security' (formerly 'Really Simple SSL'), including both free and Pro versions. [...]
title: Security plugin flaw in millions of WordPress sites gives admin access
